snippet: In 1973, Mr. Montrose formed the band Montrose, whose first album was a sleeper success, eventually going platinum and becoming a minor landmark of heavy metal.
abstract: Ronnie Montrose, an influential guitarist whose band Montrose was a mainstay of hard rock in the 1970s and the launching pad for the singer Sammy Hagar, dies at age 64.
lead_paragraph: In 1973, Mr. Montrose formed the band Montrose, whose first album was a sleeper success, eventually going platinum and becoming a minor landmark of heavy metal.

headline.seo: Ronnie Montrose, Hard-Rock Guitarist, Dies at 64
headline.main: Ronnie Montrose, Hard-Rock Guitarist, Dies at 64
